Easy to put a lot of hours into the game and continue to improve.  Devs continue to support it year after year with new content at reasonable prices. Initial investment for all of the DLCs is a little steep-- but they're not all necessary to play the game and enjoy it.

Only real complaint is a lack of a one player custom map lobby to practice/familiarize yourself with map layouts and how certain killers and perks work rather than get dropped into a game against actual players and perform terribly.

This game is terribly unbalanced on both side killer and survivor, specially the killer side, where playing said role can become so frustrating and sad, when you get a team of 4 that bully you the whole match.
They really need to consider re-balancing or creating a totally new concept about perks, because each update they come with, they bring more broken perks that bully either the survivor or killer side.
It's recommended to play this game with a friend or a team, as you'll be struggling to have fun on every match, dont either bother playing the killer side, it becomes a chore simulator.
MUY BUENO PARA JUGAR CON AMIGOS PERO ES MUY REPETITIVO
Have over 1000 hours into this game and still loving it and all the content updates. Keep it going BHVR!!!

I enjoy the team aspect and the fact you can play either killer or survivor, the problem is this game needs a large player base slanted 4/1 with survivors to killers and I don't think it will last long term, but it is a very fun game and worth the money.

Yeah, being a killer is fun.  My personal Jury is still out on being a Survivor.

The game seems really unforgiving and the mechanics feel stupid at first.  But the first time you manage to sacrifice all four survivors, you're hooked on the adrenaline.

Amazing Game! This game to some people may seem like a very temporary game where you're just doing the same thing over again, but it's really not. You get to level up and/all characters of your choice on the killer or survivor side and learn and use all of their unique abilities. You wanna be a support character??? try David King, He can take hits for others and help them escape. Wanna be a loner but repair generators for the team??? try Ace Vinsoci. There is a character for everyone's playstyle including the killers! Want to turn invisible and stalk your prey??? Try the Wraith. Or maybe you want to be brutal by trapping your prey in ruthless bear traps??? Try the trapper. OR maybe you want to slash and dash and kill everyone quickly! try the Hillbilly! My point is, this game suits anyone's play style. Don't judge the book by its cover, and definitely don't take someone's bad ratings to heart. This game is great! 11/10

I want to start off by saying that I got Dead by Daylight on release. Back then, servers were constantly disconnecting and finding games was a nightmare. After a year or so, I stopped playing. Not because the game was bad, but because there is no native Ultrawide support. Messing with the FOV in the file settings may cause your game to get corrupted, so it was not worth the hassle and I just stopped playing the game. Fast forward to this year, where I have no gotten a new monitor that brings me back to the 16:9 ratio. I have since been playing the game and it is as fun as it has ever been. Besides a couple griefers, the cooperative aspect is as tight as ever. Having that said, I am disappointed in its performance on PC. Originally, I had an RX 480, and performance was abysmal. I was barely able to achieve 60 FPS on High settings (1080p by the way). I later upgraded to a Vega 64, and while I could finally play on Ultra, it still doesn't go past 60 FPS. Fast forward to today, where my GPU dies and I had to get another GPU in the meantime, a 2070 Super. It pains me to say it is not any better whereas performance in other games have increased substantially. I hope with the new graphics overhaul update we'll get better performance out of this game. In addition to this, crossplay has been a welcome addition, however, I am disappointed that games take FOREVER to get into only to get murked by Ghostface within the first couple minutes of the match. But otherwise, fun game.
